name: Mobile Attacker: MEKJAM: Final Assault
description:
You are the pilot of humanity's most powerful weapon in the war against the evil Bawsp Empire. You are humanity's only hope.

WASD to move, left mouse to shoot.

I didn't end up working on this as much as I'd have liked so please excuse the bugs.

Made by Clarke Haight for MechJam 3.
